Room.Name: Lyanden Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are atop a hill and can see the road to the east and west.
Room.LongDescription: There's not much to see toward the south, as it seems to be an endless expanse of sand and desert. Over to the north there is a very old forest. Far to the northeast you can see two of the biggest mountains you have ever seen. The tops are hidden in clouds.
